faq.a1: Barbar Feast 2021 on luonnonkauniissa Viikinkien kyl√§ss√§, Kose kunnassa, noin 30km etel√§√§n Tallinnasta kohti Tartua
faq.a2: For those who come by car or motorcycle, the map above has links for directions (click on the red pin) - the destination is Viikingite k√ºla, Saula, 75117 Harju maakond. There will also be a Festival Bus (named "Hop On Fuck Off") departing from in front of Rockclub Barbar (R√§vala pst 8, 10145 Tallinn). More info about the Festival Bus coming soon!

faq.a5: No tottakai, mutta aina on hyv√§ olla k√§teist√§ mukana.
faq.a6: No tottakai, kunhan se ei ole Viikinkien kyl√§n j√§rjestyss√§√§nt√∂jen vastainen tai Eesti Tasavallan perustuslain vastainen asia ja ei h√§iritse l√§hiymp√§rist√∂ss√§ olevia ihmisi√§ tai el√§imi√§, ja jos sinulla on mieless√§ jotain erikoista, niin anna meille infoa etuk√§teen, varmati l√∂yd√§mme ratkaisun.

info.desc: BARBAR FEAST is not only about heavy music, it‚Äôs also about having a LOT of fun! Here are few of the things going on at the festival grounds to make this weekend even more memorable for you:
info.market: - market full of the countys best booze, mouth watering food, fancy clothes and hey ‚Äì you can even dye your hair green :p
info.boat: - taking a trip on a viking boat on a mystical river
info.tentshop: - tenting area shop (open every day until 22:00) allows you to buy booze with the usual shop prices (to be consumed in the tenting area, not outside of it). That‚Äôs especially OK for your own booze is not allowed to the festival grounds and in the tenting area. However your own alcohol free drinks and food are more than welcome (in the tenting area)
info.mc: - motorcycle club Road Devil guys will make the festival program even more magical with some cool games and whatnot ‚Äì be ready for suprises!
info.extra: + spontanious swordfights, drinking & eating orgies etc. THAT IS BARBAR FEAST
